评论概述: Love the style, but it's made for giants
评论详情: I ordered the small, I'm 5'4", 120lb, and I've tried multiple versions of this dress and other similar styles but unfortunately I drown in all of them, both in width and length. I have a good 4 extra inches of material around my waist and the fabric goes down to mid-calf. I wish the company (or companies) who sell these styles would make them in a size XS, as even the small requires a minimum height of 5'7" and a larger build in order to make them form-fitting. The material is really nice and comfortable, the collars are a bit stiff though and sit kind of awkwardly if you unbutton a few top buttons. If these fit I would order them in several colors, but alas, I will have to do without until they start making a smaller size.

评论概述: Pretty BUT A LOT OF PILLING
评论详情: The MEROKEETY Women's Long Sleeve V Neck Sweater Dress initially won me over with its flattering fit and cozy style, perfect for fall. I loved how it looked right out of the package – the ribbed knit, button details, and pleated design all made it feel effortlessly chic and put-together. It’s a great dress for dressing up or down, and I received several compliments when I first wore it.  Unfortunately, after just two washes, the dress started to show significant pilling, which was really disappointing. The fabric doesn’t look nearly as fresh or polished anymore, and I feel like it’s lost that “new” look much faster than expected. It’s still wearable, but it’s not the kind of piece I’ll reach for when I want to look polished or put-together. I’ll probably get a couple more uses out of it, but it definitely didn’t hold up as well as I’d hoped.  Overall, while it’s a stylish piece and looks great initially, the fabric quality could be better. I’d recommend it if you’re okay with it being more of a short-term wardrobe addition.
Great fit and material
The styling and fit are good; it's a nice addition to standard sweater dresses.

I am a big fan of the sweaterdress for fall.  This one comes in a really nice dark navy color.  I would definitely recommend for a fall/winter wardrobe staple, it's cute and it's classic, and could be dressed up with nice boots or could work for the office with some leggings and flats.

I love it! Great material. Great fit. You can dress it up or down. Merokeety gets it right. This is my third dress from them and they never disappoint. Fine quality items that fit great.

The MEROKEETY Women's Long sleeve sweater dress arrived rather creased from being vacuum sealed. I washed it (cool water) and dried on a low setting until mostly dry, then hung up to completely dry and that seemed to take care of the creases. The material is nice and soft and the dress has maintained its shape and softness after several washes. It seems like it would be reasonably versatile - it has a relatively flirty, swingy silhouette while also being perfectly suitable to wear to the office. You can pair it with boots for a more casual fall look but can also dress it up with heels for a more polished look and a bit of va-voom. Because of the slim fit/flared skirt I believe it will be more flattering on someone with a bit of an hour-glass figure. I got this in white and, while it's not so thin that you can see through it, it doesn't support wearing shape wear beneath it, so if you have a little pooch, this may not be the most flattering dress for you.

5'7" 140lbs 36D. Bought Large because the dress a little clingy but it is made that way. Wore skims, worked perfectly. Quailty of material is worth the money. Paired it with tights and boots, received many compliments. Worth the buy

评论概述: The buttons could be better secured
评论详情: I think this is a cute look… nothing too overwhelming or very different about it. However, I was disappointed that a button had popped off during the day and I didn’t even know it until I looked in the mirror! There definitely needs to be more stitching to keep the buttons in place for a long time.  Otherwise, I don’t have any major complaints. The fit is pretty good… I followed the size chart and didn’t have any issues with fit. Also, it’s listed as a mini dress, but the length actually fell to right above my knee- which is great for me because it made the dress more appropriate to wear to work (I’m 5’6”).  The material is really soft and comfy! I love the ribbed knit… it was very cozy to wear in fall temperatures. And the pleating just gives the overall look a little dimension. I also liked the fact that the dress was form fitting at the top and the skirt flared at the bottom; it created a very flattering silhouette.  And I do like the button-up design at the top, especially how the white buttons and lines play off of the brown dress and really pop. I just wish the buttons wouldn’t pop off the dress is all!  Overall, I think this is a fine purchase. If you have some sewing skills and can reinforce the sewing on these buttons, I’d highly recommend you do so before you wear it. Fortunately, it was just the top button that popped off for me… a button in the middle or at the bottom could have really caused a problem.

I loved this dress so much I bought it in 3 colors.  I bought beige, blue, and brown.  They are so attractive.  It is lightweight enough to not get hot but is definitely thick enough to not be see through.  It showcases your waist and looks slimming.  I have worn with ballet flats and also fall boots.  The material is very soft on the skin.  It was a great price for the value.

评论概述: FABULOUS material. Nice stretch. Nice length for tall girls
评论详情: This item runs large. But it’s ok because it shouldn’t be really clingy anyway. But if you like that “snatched look” buy the next size down. If you’re between sizes the smaller choice is the way to go. I absolutely LOVE the feel of the fabric! The white is a bit see-thru but not so bad that I’d return it. I just wear nipple covers or skin colored bra and shorties. Since I’m tall it’s often difficult to buy dresses as they’re too short. Not this dress. It’s a classy look with a classy length, falling a few inches over the knee, not mid thigh length. I will absolutely wear this to our country club. I might buy it in other colors as well. Definitely get this dress!
